summary: A dentist is a doctor who takes care of your teeth, gums, and mouth. They are also called dental surgeons. Dentists work with a team that includes dental assistants, hygienists, technicians, and sometimes therapists. This team helps provide dental care and keeps your oral health in check. They ensure your teeth stay strong and healthy, and they can also help with any issues or pain you might have in your mouth.
title: Dentist
